tika-s0304t0:4_2: yathāsabhāvato ārammaṇassa jānanena samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattatīti attho.
tika-s0304t0:4_6: asādhāraṇato hi sattasantānesu sassatucchedadiṭṭhi anulomikañāṇayathābhūtañāṇānañceva kāmarāgānusayādīnañca
tika-s0304t0:4_8: Heṭṭhimā tayo maggā catusaccadhammesu vuttākārena pavattiyā dhamme cakkhūti dhammacakkhu,
tika-s0304t0:4_9: tathā tesaṃ phalāni taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhesu paṭippassaddhipahānavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0304t0:4_12: Dibbavihārasannissayena laddhabbato devānaṃ dibbacakkhu viyāti taṃ dibbacakkhu,
tika-s0304t0:4_17: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādī”tiādinā nayena āgatattā catusaccaparicchedakañāṇaṃ “paññācakkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:5_7: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana saṇṭhānena saddhiṃ “cuddasa sambhārā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-s0304t0:5_9: Visuṃ vacanaṃ pana nesaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ atathābhūtānañca āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānaṃ yathāvutte maṃsapiṇḍe vijjamānattā.
tika-s0304t0:5_10: Sambhavassa catudhātunissitehi saha vuttassa dhātuttayanissitatā yojetabbā.
tika-s0304t0:5_11: Diṭṭhimaṇḍaleti abhimukhaṃ ṭhitānaṃ paṭibimbapaññāyanaṭṭhānabhūte cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā pavattiṭṭhānabhūte maṇḍale.
tika-s0304t0:5_13: Tathā hi so satta akkhipaṭalāni abhibyāpetvā vattati.
tika-s0304t0:5_14: Yasmā so satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitehi attano nissayabhūtehi katūpakāraṃ taṃnissiteheva āyuvaṇṇādīhi
tika-s0304t0:5_15: anupālitaparivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0304t0:5_16: Rūpadassanasamatthanti attānaṃ nissāya pavattaviññāṇassa vasena rūpāyatanadassanasamatthaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:5_17: Vitthārakathāti tassa cakkhuno sotādīnañca hetupaccayādivasena ceva lakkhaṇādivasena ca vitthārakathā.
tika-s0304t0:6_3: Tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dassetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattassa pāpanavasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0304t0:9_4: Tehīti yehi dutiyatatiyāni suttāni desitāni, tehi.
tika-s0304t0:9_6: Ettakenāti dvinnaṃ ekasseva vā lakkhaṇassa kathanena.
tika-s0304t0:12_0: 4-6. Vuttasadisovāti “dve lakkhaṇānī”tiādinā vuttasadiso eva. Nayoti atidesanayo.
tika-s0304t0:15_1: Sallakkhetvāti atītānāgatānaṃ avijjamānattā gāhassa daḷhatāya sallakkhetvā.
tika-s0304t0:15_2: Paccuppannesu vijjamānattā balavatā taṇhādigāhena vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipādetuṃ kilamantānaṃ vineyyānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0304t0:20_1: Dvīsupi suttesu āyatanānaṃ vasena desanā ekarasāvāti “paṭhamadutiyesū”ti ekajjhaṃ paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0304t0:20_11: Tattha ajjhattajjhattaṃ ajjhatte bhavanti ajjhattikanti āha “ajjhattajjhattavasena ajjhattikāna”nti.
tika-s0304t0:20_12: Tesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ ajjhattesupi ajjhattikabhāvo adhikasinehavatthutāyāti āha “chandarāgassa adhimattabalavatāyā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:20_13: Idāni tattha tamatthaṃ paṭiyoginā saddhiṃ udāharaṇavasena dassento “manussānaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0304t0:23_2: Visaṃyuttā saṃyogahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā no saṃyuttā.
tika-s0304t0:26_1: Vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ abhinandanānaṃ uppādanirodhānañca vasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0304t0:31_1: saddo pakaraṇavasena katthaci sappadesepi pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ anavasesavisayena sabba-
tika-s0304t0:32_3: dassanabhūtena ñāṇena adiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiñci natthīti attho.
tika-s0304t0:32_4: Yadi evaṃ anumānavisayaṃ nu kho kathanti āha “atho aviññāta”nti.
tika-s0304t0:32_5: Aññesaṃ apaccakkhampi aviññātaṃ tassa kiñci natthīti adiṭṭhaṃ aviññātaṃ natthi.
tika-s0304t0:32_10: Jānituṃ ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma tassa kiñci natthīti dassento āha “sabbaṃ abhiññāsī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t0:33_1: Sabbadhammesūti pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu sabbesu dhammesu.
tika-s0304t0:33_2: Yasmā chasupi ārammaṇesu gahitesu padesasabbaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-s0304t0:33_4: Padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu ekadesassa asaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-s0304t0:33_5: Sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti lokuttaradhammānaṃ asaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-s0304t0:33_12: “Āyatanasabbepi idha vipassanupagadhammāva gahetabbā abhiññeyyaniddesavasenapi sammasanacārasseva icchitattā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0304t0:34_0: Paṭikkhipitvāti “idaṃ sabbaṃ nāma na hotī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0304t0:34_2: Vācāya vattabbavatthumattakamevāti vañjhāputtagaganakusumādivācā viya etassa vācāya kevalaṃ vattabbavatthukameva bhaveyya, na attho,
tika-s0304t0:34_5: Taṃ kissa hetūti vighātāpajjanaṃ kena hetunā.
tika-s0304t0:34_6: Yathā taṃ avisayasminti yathā aññopi koci avisaye vāyamanto,
tika-s0304t0:34_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ “taṃ kissa hetū”ti vuttakāraṇameva upanayanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:37_6: Eseva nayoti apadesena “sotasamphassaṃ mūlapaccayaṃ katvā”tiādinā vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:37_10: Taṃpubbakattā manoviññāṇaphassavedanānaṃ mūlapaccayabhūtā sabbesveva cakkhudvārādīsu vuttittā tadanurūpato “bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:37_12: bhavaṅgasampayuttāya pana vedanāya gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0304t0:37_13: Bhavaṅgato amocetvā bhavaṅgacittena saddhiṃyeva āvajjanaṃ gahetvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:37_14: Yā panettha desanāti yā ettha “pahānāyā”tiādinā pavattadesanā satthu anasiṭṭhi āṇā.
tika-s0304t0:37_15: Ayaṃ paṇṇatti nāma tassa tassa atthassa pakārato ñāpanato.
tika-s0304t0:37_17: paññatti pana katamāti vicāraṇāya taṃ dassetuṃ “yā panetthā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:43_1: “Abhijāna”ntiādinā ettha bhagavā paṭhamaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ dassetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dasseti veneyyajjhāsayavasena.
tika-s0304t0:46_3: Heṭṭhā āpāthagatampi anāpāthagatampi gahitameva “ye ca rūpā”ti anavasesato vuttattā.
tika-s0304t0:46_4: Te hi vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā saha cakkhuviññāṇena viññātabbattā.
tika-s0304t0:46_5: Tathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tehi ekuppādaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekārammaṇameva.
tika-s0304t0:46_6: Sesapadesūti sesesu “yañca sotaṃ ye ca saddā”tiādinā āgatesu kaṇhapakkhe pañcasu,
tika-s0304t0:46_8: Eseva nayoti yvāyaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitarūpameva gaṇhitvā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0304t0:49_1: Gayānāmikāya nadiyā avidūre pavatto gāmo gayā nāma,
tika-s0304t0:49_2: tassaṃ gayāyaṃ viharatīti samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:49_3: Gayāgāmassa hi āsanne gayāsīsanāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe bhagavā tadā vihāsi.
tika-s0304t0:50_1: yathā cāyaṃ desanā tesaṃ sappāyā jātā,
tika-s0304t0:50_2: tatra tasmiṃ atthadvaye vibhāvetabbe ayaṃ anupubbikathā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anupaṭipāṭikathā.
tika-s0304t0:51_2: Bhagavāpi tassa puttoti katvā “aññe tayo puttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:51_4: Pidahīti dātuṃ na sakkomīti tathā akāsi.
tika-s0304t0:51_5: Saccavāditāya gaṇhiṃsūti rājakulassa saccavāditāya attano varaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-s0304t0:52_1: Antarāti tumhehi paricchinnakālassa antarā eva matā.
tika-s0304t0:53_2: yathā desanāya gahito attho paccakkhato vibhūto hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0304t0:53_8: Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvena dukkhamatāya dukkhassa kathitattā.
tika-s0304t0:56_0: 29. Adhisaddena samānattho addhasaddoti āha “addhabhūtanti adhibhūta”ntiādi. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0304t0:59_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “maññitaṃ nāma cakkhādīsu eva uppajjati,
tika-s0304t0:59_9: mānadiṭṭhimaññitāna”nti vuttaṃ maññitattayaṃ saparasantānesu paṭipakkhavasena yojetvā dassetuṃ “cakkhuṃ ahanti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:59_10: Tattha “cakkhuṃ aha”nti iminā ajjhattavisayaṃ diṭṭhimaññitañca dasseti attābhinivesāhaṃkāradīpanato.
tika-s0304t0:59_15: so ca cakkhusmiṃ tadadhīnavuttittā “paro”ti na maññati.
tika-s0304t0:60_0: Ahaṃ cakkhuto niggatoti “aha”nti vattabbo ayaṃ satto cakkhuto niggato tattha sukhumākārena upalabbhanato.
tika-s0304t0:60_1: Mama kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto niggato tasmiṃ sati eva upalabbhanato.
tika-s0304t0:60_4: Mama cakkhūti na maññati yassa taṃ cakkhu,
tika-s0304t0:60_15: Puna tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ “loko”ti gahetvā “na kiñci loke upādiyatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:60_17: Evaṃ sabbathāpi catucattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0304t0:63_6: Aññathābhāvaṃ vipariṇāmanti uppādavayatāya aññathābhāvaṃ jarāya maraṇena ca dvedhā vipariṇāmetabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:63_9: Bhavesu satto loko uparipi bhavaṃyeva abhinandati.
tika-s0304t0:63_10: Heṭṭhā gahitameva saṅkaḍḍhitvāti “cakkhuṃ na maññatī”tiādinā heṭṭhā gahitameva khandhadhātuāyatanāti
tika-s0304t0:63_11: khandhādipariyāyena ekato gahetvā punapi maññanāvatthuṃ dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:63_12: Avasāne “tato taṃ hotī”ti vuttapadena saddhiṃ sabbavāresu aṭṭha aṭṭha hontīti “aṭṭhacattālīsāya ṭhānesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:66_1: Dassetvāti ettha lakkhaṇe ayaṃ tvā- saddo,
tika-s0304t0:66_5: Arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saha vipassanāya cattāropi maggā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:73_1: Ñātapariññā āgatā visayavasena tabbisayassa dhammassa jotitattā.
tika-s0304t0:73_2: Itarā dve tīraṇapahānapariññāpi āgatā evāti veditabbā,
tika-s0304t0:73_6: Itarāpi dve gahitāyeva tāhi vinā atthasiddhiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:73_10: Upasaṭṭharogena viya anto eva abhihatasabbatā upahataṭṭho.
tika-s0304t0:77_3: vindiyaṃ na vindatīti katvā vijjāya paṭipakkhova avijjā.
tika-s0304t0:82_1: “Imaṃ ekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ tassa “pantānī”tipadena saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0304t0:91_7: Rūparāgaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti “natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo”ti pajānāti.
tika-s0304t0:94_4: yo channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0304t0:94_7: Ayamevāti ayaṃ cakkhusmiṃ “netaṃ mamā”tiādinā tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ abhāvo eva.
tika-s0304t0:99_0: 73. Panassasanti ekaṃsena naṭṭhoti ayamettha atthoti āha “atinaṭṭho”ti, dhurato eva naṭṭhoti attho.
tika-s0304t0:104_1: Appaññātoti nāmagottato ceva sīlādiguṇehi ca appaññāto avissuto.
tika-s0304t0:107_2: so eva dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanato parāmāso,
tika-s0304t0:107_4: Tena abhinivesaparāmāsaggāhena gaṇhituṃ na yuttā aniccādisabhāvattā.
tika-s0304t0:112_1: Taṇhāya pahīnāya diṭṭhimānāpi pahīnā evāti “taṇhāpapañcassa chinnattā chinnapapañce”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:112_3: Idha sattavohāro cakkhādīsu vijjamānesu eva hoti,
tika-s0304t0:112_5: nāññathāti atikkantabuddhehi pariharitāni cakkhusotādīni pucchāmīti pucchati “atthi nu kho bhante”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t0:117_3: aniccalakkhaṇe kathite itaralakkhaṇāni kathitāneva honti byabhicārabhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:124_1: Taṃ panettha āyatiṃ appaṭisandhibhāvato hotīti āha “appavattika”nti.
tika-s0304t0:124_4: Kiñcāpi thero pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā kathesi,
tika-s0304t0:124_5: “na samanupassāmī”ti pana vadanto kiñci nipphattiṃ na kathesi,
tika-s0304t0:124_6: tasmā “idampi manasi kātabba”nti idaṃ ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0304t0:125_2: Ālayanikanti pariyuṭṭhāneti bhavantare apekkhāsaññite ālaye nikantiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānappattiyā.
tika-s0304t0:125_6: Anurūpagamanaṃ gati nāma tadubhayaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0304t0:125_10: Evaṃ pana cutūpapāte asati nevidha na idha loke.
tika-s0304t0:125_13: Ayameva anto ayaṃ idhaloke paraloke ca abhāvoyeva dukkhassa pariyosānaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:125_15: ettha etasmiṃ pāṭhe paramparāgato pamāṇabhūto attho.
tika-s0304t0:126_11: Na antarābhavadīpanaṃ tādisassa anupalabbhanato payojanābhāvato ca.
tika-s0304t0:126_13: tatthassa nissayabhūtassa vatthussa sahabhāvīnañca khandhānaṃ sambhavoti saddhiṃ attano nissayena viññāṇaṃ
tika-s0304t0:126_15: “Neva idha na hura”nti vuttadvayato aparaṃ vikappena “na ubhaya”nti,
tika-s0304t0:127_5: kathesīti asekkhakāle byākaraṇaṃ viya katvā kathesi.
tika-s0304t0:128_2: Evanti evaṃ pubbakālesu saṃsaṭṭhavihārī hutvā ṭhito pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatīti āsaṅkanto pucchati.
tika-s0304t0:131_3: Nandisamudayāti nandiyā samudayataṇhāya sesakāraṇehi nandiyā samuditi samodhānaṃ nandisamudayo,
tika-s0304t0:131_6: Pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa dukkhassa samodhānena samuditi pavattiyevāti saha samudayena dukkhassa dassitattā “vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:131_7: Nirodhūpāyena saddhiṃ nirodhassa dassitattā “vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:132_4: Ghaṭikamuggarenāti ekasmiṃ pakkhe ghaṭikaṃ dassetvā katena rassadaṇḍena.
tika-s0304t0:132_6: tato eva jīvitassa haraṇato hārakañcāti satthahārakaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:133_1: Ete dveti ayaṃ puṇṇatthero tassa kaniṭṭhoti ete dve bhātaro.
tika-s0304t0:133_2: Āhacca aṭṭhāsi uḷāraṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0304t0:133_3: Satta sīhanāde naditvāti mammacchedakānampi akkosaparibhāsānaṃ khamane santosābhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:133_9: khamane santosābhāvadīpanañcāti evaṃ satta sīhanāde naditvā.
tika-s0304t0:133_10: Catūsu ṭhānesu vasitattā pāḷiyaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ anuddesikaṃ katvā “sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharati”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:134_4: Tanti caṅkamaṃ āruyha koci bhikkhu caṅkamituṃ samattho natthi mahatā samuddaparissayena bhāvanāmanasikārassa anabhisambhuṇanato.
tika-s0304t0:135_0: Āraddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti maṇḍalamāḷassa kātuṃ pathavīmitakālato pabhuti.
tika-s0304t0:137_9: tesaṃ devatānañca vasena “mahantaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:138_0: Aruṇaṃ pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva uṭṭhapesi devatānuggahatthañceva kulānudayāya ca.
tika-s0304t0:138_4: taṃ yuñjati ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme”ti micchāgāhehi.
tika-s0304t0:139_0: Chaṭṭhanti bāhiyasuttaṃ. Taṃ uttānameva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0304t0:145_2: Pāḷiyaṃ āmeḍitalopena niddesoti āha “dve dve koṭṭhāse”ti.
tika-s0304t0:145_3: Evametanti evaṃ aniccādibhāvena etaṃ cakkhurūpañcāti dvayaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:145_10: Yasmā ca saṃgacchamānadhammavimuttā saṅgati nāma natthi,
tika-s0304t0:145_12: tesaṃ vasena nibbatto phasso tathā vuccatīti.
tika-s0304t0:146_6: yasmā rūpārammaṇe phasse attano phusanakiccaṃ karonte evaṃ vedanā anubhavanakiccaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:146_8: tasmā “phassena phuṭṭhamevā”tiādivuttameva atthaṃ idāni puggalādhiṭṭhānena dassetuṃ “phuṭṭho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:146_9: Pañceva khandhā bhagavatā samatiṃsāya ākārehi vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:146_11: Rukkhasākhāsu rukkhavohāro viya ekekadhammepi khandhavohāro hotiyeva.
tika-s0304t0:154_6: Manomayaṃ vitakkanti kevalaṃ manasā sambhāvitaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:155_0: Suṭṭhu bhāvitoti suṭṭhubhāvaṃ subhāvanaṃ ito bhāvitabhāvito.
tika-s0304t0:155_1: Phuṭṭhassa cittanti tena yathāvuttaphassena phuṭṭhaṃ assa cittaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:155_2: Na vikampate kvacīti kismiñci iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇe na kampati.

tika-s0304t0:312_18: evaṃ cakkhusamuddassa purato aparāparaṃ parivattamānaṃ nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussāti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0304t0:312_20: Asamapekkhiteti sammādassane rūpe manāpabhāvaṃ amanāpabhāvañca gahetvā,
tika-s0304t0:312_21: “idaṃ nāma mayā diṭṭha”nti anupadhārentassa kevalaṃ samūhaghanavasena gaṇhantassa gahaṇaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:313_3: Yathā samudde ūmiyo uparūpari vattamānā attani patitapuggalaṃ ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādenti,
tika-s0304t0:313_5: Evamete rāgādayo kilesā sayaṃ uppannakasatte ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādenti,
tika-s0304t0:313_6: kilesuppattinimittatāya sattānaṃ anayabyasanāpattihetubhūtassa ūmibhayassa ārammaṇavasena cakkhusamuddo “saūmisāvaṭṭo sagāho sarakkhaso”ti vutto.
tika-s0304t0:314_3: Sveva cittassa ca abhimaddanavasenuppādanatthena daḷhaṃ āyāsanaṭṭhena upāyāso.
tika-s0304t0:314_4: Ettha ca anekavāraṃ pavattitvā satte ajjhottharitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā anayabyasananipphādanena kodhūpāyāsassa ūmisadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0304t0:314_5: Tathā kāmaguṇā kilesābhibhūte satte māne viya rūpādivisayasaṅkhāte attani saṃsāretvā yathā tato bahibhūte nekkhamme cittampi na uppajjati,
tika-s0304t0:314_7: Yadā pana gāharakkhaso ārakkharahitaṃ attano gocarabhūmigataṃ purisaṃ abhibhuyya gahetvā agocare ṭhitampi
tika-s0304t0:314_8: gocaraṃ netvā bheravarūpadassanādinā attano upakkamaṃ kātuṃ asamatthaṃ katvā anvāvisitvā vaṇṇabalabhogaāyusukhehi
tika-s0304t0:314_10: evaṃ mātugāmopi yonisomanasikārarahitaṃ avīrapurisaṃ attano rūpādīhi palobhanavasena abhibhuyya gahetvā
tika-s0304t0:314_11: vā vīrajātiyampi itthikuttabhūtehi attano hāvabhāvavilāsehi itthimāyāya anvāvisitvā vā avasaṃ attano
tika-s0304t0:314_12: upakāradhamme sīlādayo sampādetuṃ asamatthaṃ karonto guṇavaṇṇādīhi viyojetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpādeti,
tika-s0304t0:314_16: evaṃ āvaṭṭagāharakkhasāpīti ūmiādibhayena sabhayanti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0304t0:317_3: Te hi kāmabhavavasena atintatāya na samunnā.
tika-s0304t0:317_5: Tīhi upadhīhīti kilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇānaṃ vasena tīhi upadhīhi.
tika-s0304t0:317_6: Khandhupadhinā pana so na nirūpadhi saupādisesasseva nibbānassa adhigatattā.
tika-s0304t0:320_3: Sati paccaye vijjamānakiccakaraṇato pariyuṭṭhānaṃ appakaṃ mūsikāvisaṃ viya parittaṃ nāma hoti appānubhāvattā.
tika-s0304t0:320_11: Taṃ ubhayanti taṃ cakkhurūpanti ubhayampi āyatanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:323_3: Yasmā hetupaccayā viññāṇassa uppatti sati ca uppāde nirodhena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:323_5: yadi ca attā siyā paccayehi vinā sijjheyya,
tika-s0304t0:326_1: Kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato paribyattiyā uppattipaccayabhāvato anubyañjanaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:326_5: Saṃsandetvā gahaṇanti avayave samodhānetvā “itthipuriso”tiādinā ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:326_8: “sabbameva gaṇhātī”ti hatthapādādīsu taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ vibhajitvā gahaṇaṃ rattapāsadiso jalūkagāhasadiso.
tika-s0304t0:326_9: Ekajavanavārepi labbhantīti idaṃ cakkhudvārānusārena uppannamanodvārikajavanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:327_0: Nimittassādena ganthitanti yathāvutte nimitte assādagāhena ganthitaṃ sambaddhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:327_2: Kilesabhayaṃ dassentoti tathā kilesuppattiyā sati akusalacittena antaritaṃ ce maraṇacittaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0304t0:327_3: ekantato niraye vā tiracchānayoniyā vā uppatti siyāti kilesānaṃ bhāyitabbaṃ dassento.
tika-s0304t0:327_4: “Samayavasena vā evaṃ vutta”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaranto “cakkhudvārasmiñhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0304t0:328_4: Tattha hi kadāci antarā micchāvitakkānaṃ sallakānaṃ avasaro siyā,
tika-s0304t0:331_1: Navamaṃ “paññāyatī”ti vuccamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttanti āha –
tika-s0304t0:336_1: Ye bhikkhū tadā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā,
tika-s0304t0:336_6: keci attapañcamā hutvā araññāyatanesu viharantīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0304t0:336_15: bhikkhave”ti ārabhitvā yāva “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti ayaṃ mātikānikkhepo.
tika-s0304t0:336_18: Sineruṃ ukkhipanto viyātiādi imissā desanāya anaññasādhāraṇatāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:337_0: Mañcaṭṭhesu mañcasamaññā viya mukhaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ “mukha”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:337_1: Sukkhakaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato “kaṭṭha”nti vuccatīti kaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ etassāti kaṭṭhamukho,
tika-s0304t0:337_3: Atha vā kaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato kaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ vā mukhe etassāti kaṭṭhamukho.
tika-s0304t0:337_6: Idāni taṃ nesaṃ visakiccabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:337_7: Ayasūlasamappitaṃ viyāti abbhantare ayasūlaṃ anuppavesitaṃ viya.
tika-s0304t0:337_8: Pakkapūtipanasaṃ viyāti paccitvā kālātikkame kuthitapanasaphalaṃ viya.
tika-s0304t0:338_1: Vātenāti tassa sappassa sarīraṃ phusitvā uggatavātena.
tika-s0304t0:338_3: Puggalapaṇṇattivasenāti tesaṃyeva soḷasannaṃ sappānaṃ āgatavisotiādipuggalanāmassa vasena catusaṭṭhi honti paccekaṃ catubbidhabhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:338_9: Udakasappo hi ghoraviso hoti yevāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0304t0:338_14: Iminā upāyenāti yoyaṃ kaṭṭhamukhesu daṭṭhavisānaṃyeva “āgataviso no ghoraviso”tiādinā catubbidhabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0304t0:338_19: pūtimukhādīsu ca daṭṭhavisādayo cattāro cattāro veditabbo.
tika-s0304t0:339_3: Gatamaggassāti yathāvuttasaṅkhyāgatamaggassa paṭilomato saṃkhippamānā anukkamena cattārova honti.
tika-s0304t0:340_0: Sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitavisāti hi tesaṃ phuṭṭhavisatā,
tika-s0304t0:341_0: Āsīvisesūti ime āsīvisā daṭṭhavisā evāti veditabbā.
tika-s0304t0:341_1: Sarīraṭṭhakesuyevāti tena purisena tesaṃ kassaci aniṭṭhassa akatattā āyusesassa ca vijjamānattā naṃ na daṃsiṃsūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:342_2: Idāni tāsaṃ pesane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhama”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:342_4: Īdisīpi hi vacoyutti loke nirūpīyati santiyaṃ purisaṃ ṭhapetīti viya.
tika-s0304t0:342_5: Tasmā abhimukhagatanti abhimukhaṃ tena sampattanti attho.
tika-s0304t0:342_6: Vaṅkasaṇṭhānaṃ phalakaṃ rukkhamūle āgatāgatānaṃ nisīdanatthāya atthataṃ.
tika-s0304t0:343_2: Ekena dvīhi vā gantabbo rukkhamayo setu rukkhasetu.
tika-s0304t0:343_6: Tadattho pana ekadesena sambhavatīti tathā vuttanti dassento “ettakānaṃ paccatthikānaṃ bāhitattā”ti āha.
tika-s0304t0:343_9: Na laddho vatāsīti na laddho vata āsi.
tika-s0304t0:344_0: Rājā viya kammaṃ sattesu issariyassa vattāpanato. Rājā…pe…
tika-s0304t0:344_2: Ñāṇapalāyanenāti mahābhūtehi nibbinditvā virajjitvā vimuccitukāmatāvasena uppannañāṇapalāyane maggādhigamasiddheneva ñāṇapalāyanena.
tika-s0304t0:345_4: Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena daṭṭho patthaddho hoti,
tika-s0304t0:345_5: evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti,
tika-s0304t0:345_11: kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho hoti,
tika-s0304t0:345_12: tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhagato viya hotīti. Vā-
tika-s0304t0:345_15: kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti vā,
tika-s0304t0:345_17: Pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti.
tika-s0304t0:345_23: tadā puriso kaṭṭhamukhādisappassa mukhe vattamāno viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0304t0:346_1: Anatthaggahaṇatotiādi acetanesupi bhūtesu sacetanesu viya anatthādīnaṃ paccakkhatāya nibbedajananatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:347_2: taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa kakkhaḷabhāvāpādanādinā vikāruppādanato visavegavikārato sadisatā veditabbā.
tika-s0304t0:348_3: Pañcavokāre hi jātiyā abhinandanā nāma mahābhūtābhinandanā eva.
tika-s0304t0:350_0: Rūpakkhandho bhijjamāno cattāro arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekanirodhattā.
tika-s0304t0:350_1: Vatthurūpampi gahetvāva bhijjanti pañcavokāre arūpakkhandhesu bhinnesu rūpakkhandhassa avaṭṭhānābhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:350_3: Paññā nāma attabhāve uttamaṅgaṃ paññuttarattā kusaladhammānaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:350_4: sati ca kilesuppattiyaṃ paññāya anuppajjanato vuttaṃ –
tika-s0304t0:350_11: “hatthampi chindatī”tiādinā āgatāni dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇāni āgatāneva honti kāraṇassa samavaṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0304t0:351_2: Kiñci alabhitvāti tasmiṃ suññagāme corānaṃ gayhūpagassa alābhavacaneneva tassa purisassa attano paṭisaraṇassa alābho vutto eva hotīti na uddhaṭo,
tika-s0304t0:352_1: Pañca kiccānīti corehi tadā kātabbāni pañca kiccāni.
tika-s0304t0:352_6: Attano sukhāvahaṃ kusaladhammaṃ pahāya dukkhāvahena akusalena samaṅgitā sukhāvahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pahāya bahi
tika-s0304t0:352_14: Avasesajanassa dāsaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbatā aññathattappattigihibhāvāpattiyā nidassanabhāvena vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:352_16: tameva ārammaṇaṃ nissāya samparāyiko dukkhakkhandho veditabboti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:354_1: Mānasaṃ bandhatīti tasmiṃ citte kiccaṃ nibandhati.
tika-s0304t0:354_2: “Ayaṃ ariyamaggo mayhaṃ oghuttaranupāyo”ti tattha cittassa sanniṭṭhānaṃ puna tattha pavattanaṃ vīriyārambho cittabandhanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:355_0: Tassa nāmarūpassa ime nandīrāgādayo taṇhāvijjādayoti katvā paccayo dhammāyatanekadeso.
tika-s0304t0:355_5: patiṭṭhahiṃsūti vipañcitaññū evettha gahaṇavasena adhigatavisesā paricchinditā.
tika-s0304t0:355_6: Te hi tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakabhāvena satthu santike sannisinnā.
tika-s0304t0:355_7: Ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ pana neyyānañca visesādhigamo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na ruḷhoti idha na gahitoti.
tika-s0304t0:358_1: Susaṃvutindriyassa bhojane mattaññuno satassa sampajānassa viharato kilesanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ anavasaranti sukhasomanassabahulatā vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:358_2: Yavati tena phalaṃ missitaṃ viya hotīti yoni,
tika-s0304t0:358_8: Yaṃ yanti dandhaṃ majjhaṃ javoti javādīsu yaṃ yaṃ gamanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:359_1: Dantānampi sindhavānaṃ sārathino payogena siyā kāci visevanamattāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento “nibbisevane katvā pesento”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:359_2: Ñāṇaṃ gacchatīti asaṅgamanaṃ pavattati pageva indriyabhāvanāya katattā,
tika-s0304t0:360_0: Mahāmaṇḍapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma lohapāsādassa purato eva mahābhikkhusaṅghassa sannipātakāle tesaṃ pahonakavasena mahāmaṇḍapassa kattabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:362_1: Bhūmiyaṃ chaḍḍesi “bhikkhūnaṃ adatvā mayā mukhe pakkhitta”nti.
tika-s0304t0:363_2: Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthena kātabbakiccakaraṇato.
tika-s0304t0:363_3: Tejussadattāti idaṃ anutrāsasseva sīhassa sayananti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:363_5: pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvāti hi idaṃ pādānaṃ avikkhittabhāvakaraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:364_1: Yebhuyyena hi tathāgatā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvāva sayanti.
tika-s0304t0:364_4: Idha sīhaseyyā āgatā pādaṃ accādhāya pubbenāparaṃ ajahitasaṃlakkhaṇā seyyāti katvā.
tika-s0304t0:365_3: Tathā tesu niddokkamanassa ādipariyosānesu ajahitasatisampajaññaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0304t0:365_5: Etaṃ panāti “niddaṃ okkamantopi sato sampajāno hotī”ti vuttanayaṃ vadati.
tika-s0304t0:365_6: Ñāṇadhātukanti na rocayiṃsūti niddokkamanepi jāgaraṇe pavattañāṇasabhāvamevāti na rocayiṃsu porāṇā.
tika-s0304t0:366_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti saṅkhepena kathitā.
tika-s0304t0:369_6: Samodahantoti diṭṭhamattasseva ca gahaṇato manovitakke tattheva sammadeva odahanto.
tika-s0304t0:372_4: Tiriyaṃ patito daṇḍasetu viya ṭhitattā mahājanassa paccayo jāto,
tika-s0304t0:373_2: “Cittaṃ nāmeta”ntiādinā cintetvā gihibandhanaṃ na vissajjetīti sambandho.
tika-s0304t0:374_3: Atthato evaṃ vadantīti tathā atthassa sambhavato evaṃ vadantā viya honti.
tika-s0304t0:374_4: Yāgumattake yāgunti yāguṃ pivitvā tāya aparipakkāya eva aññaṃ yāguṃ ajjhoharitvāti sambandho.
tika-s0304t0:375_1: Akkhīni nīharitvāti kodhavasena akkhike karonto akkhīni nīharitvā vicarissati.
tika-s0304t0:376_0: Diṭṭhigatikoti sāsaniko evaṃ ayoniso ummujjitvā sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā dīpento ariṭṭhasadiso.
tika-s0304t0:376_3: aññathā tato cutassa kuto rūpakkhandhassa sambhavo.
tika-s0304t0:376_4: Asaññībhave cittaṃ atthīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t0:376_5: Bahucittakkhaṇiko lokuttaramaggo “yo ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyya sattavassānī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0304t0:376_10: Iti vadanto evaṃ micchāvādaṃ paggayha vadanto.
tika-s0304t0:377_3: Dhammakathikānaṃ vicārethāti idaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ ayyānaṃ tassa tassa yuttavasena vicārethāti niyyātanavasena vatvā.
tika-s0304t0:380_7: Pūresīti heṭṭhā ca tattha tattha atītāni kālavacanāni porāṇaṭṭhakathāya āgatattā kira vuttāni.
tika-s0304t0:381_0: Upagamanānupagamanādīni orimassa pārimassa ca upagamanānupagamanāni ceva majjhe saṃsīdanāni ca.
tika-s0304t0:381_5: Tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānanti hutvā abhāvato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepatotiādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena.
tika-s0304t0:382_2: Yathā tassa tassa sattassa orabhāvattā ajjhattikāni āyatanāni orimaṃ tīraṃ katvā vuttāni,
tika-s0304t0:382_3: evaṃ nesaṃ parabhāvattā bāhirāni āyatanāni pārimaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0304t0:383_2: Pāsāṇo nu kho esa khāṇukoti gahetabbadārukkhandhasadiso vutto.
tika-s0304t0:384_1: Catūsu apāyesūti pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe patitapuggalo manussalokepi guṇasarīrabhedanena dīgharattaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ āpajjatiyeva,
tika-s0304t0:385_6: Saṅkāya vāti attano vā saṅkāya paresaṃ samācārakiriyaṃ sarati āsaṅkati.
tika-s0304t0:385_8: Tāni kammāni pavisatīti tāni kammāni karontānaṃ antare pavisati.
tika-s0304t0:385_9: Guṇānaṃ pūtibhāvenāti guṇabhāvena gahitānaṃ sīladhammānaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvappattiyā.
tika-s0304t0:389_2: taṃ paṭicchāditakālato paṭṭhāya saṃkiliṭṭhā nāma antarāyikabhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:389_3: Āvīkatā pana anāpattiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti asaṃkiliṭṭhā nāma. Tenāha –
tika-s0304t0:389_5: Evarūpaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti paṭicchāditatāya vā duṭṭhullabhāvena vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:392_7: Saha atthānusāsanaṃ agāranti tasmiṃ atthe ttha-
tika-s0304t0:392_10: paṭhamaṃ tattha sammantanavasena santharanti vicārentīti attho.
tika-s0304t0:393_0: Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissatīti buddhavacanassa āgamanasīsena ariyaphaladhammānampi āgamanaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0304t0:393_2: Tasmiñca bhikkhusaṅghe kalyāṇadhammā kalyāṇaputhujjanā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentā hontīti ariyamaggadhammānampi tattha āgamanaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-s0304t0:394_8: Hatthattharaassattharā hatthiassapiṭṭhīsu attharitabbā hatthiassarūpavicittā ca attharakā.
tika-s0304t0:394_10: Cittattharakaṃ nānāvidharūpehi ceva nānāvidhamālākammādīhi ca vicittaṃ attharakaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:395_6: Tīsu passesu ekapasse eva vā saupassayaṃ apassayapīṭhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:396_0: Saṃvidhāyāti antaravāsakassa koṇapadesaṃ itarapadesañca samaṃ katvā vidhāya. Tenāha –
tika-s0304t0:396_3: Yasmā buddhānaṃ rūpasampadā viya ākappasampadāpi paramukkaṃsataṃ gatā,
tika-s0304t0:396_4: tasmā tadā bhagavā evaṃ sobheyyāti dassento “suvaṇṇapāmaṅgenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0304t0:396_5: Tattha “asamena buddhavesenā”tiādinā tadā bhagavā buddhānubhāvassa niguhane kāraṇābhāvato tattha sannipatitadevamanussanāgayakkhagandhabbādīnaṃ
tika-s0304t0:396_6: pasādajananatthaṃ attano sabhāvapakatiyāva kapilavatthuṃ pāvisīti dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:396_7: Buddhānaṃ kāyapabhā nāma pakatiyā asītihatthamattapadesaṃ visaratīti āha “asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesī”ti.
tika-s0304t0:397_0: Sabbapāliphulloti mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva sākhaggā samantato phullo vikasito.
tika-s0304t0:397_5: samatiṃsāya pāramitāhi abhisaṅkhatattā evaṃ virocitthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0304t0:397_6: “Pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānanti satamukhā hutvā samuddaṃ paviṭṭhāya mahāgaṅgāya mahantamahantānaṃ gaṅgānaṃ pañcavīsatī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0304t0:397_10: Sambhijjāti sambhedaṃ missībhāvaṃ patvā mukhadvāreti samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0304t0:399_0: Kampayanto vasundharanti attano guṇavisesehi pathavīkammaṃ unnādento,
tika-s0304t0:399_2: Sabbapadakkhiṇattā buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ uddharanto.
tika-s0304t0:399_7: Nātidūre uddharatīti atidūre ṭhapetuṃ na uddharati.
tika-s0304t0:399_8: Naccāsanne ca nikkhipanti accāsanne ca ṭhāne anikkhipanto niyyāti.
tika-s0304t0:400_0: Buddhānubhāvassa pakāsanavasena gatattā vaṇṇakālo nāma esa.
tika-s0304t0:400_1: Sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā kathiyamāne dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-s0304t0:401_2: Maṇiverocano yathāti caturāsītisahassamaṇiparivārito ativiya virocamāno vijjotamāno maṇi viya.
tika-s0304t0:401_6: Padumo kokanado yathāti kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ mahāpadumaṃ viya,
tika-s0304t0:402_0: Ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viyātiādi tassā pakiṇṇakakathāya aññesaṃ sudukkarabhāvadassanañceva suṇantānaṃ accantasukhāvahabhāvadassanañca.
tika-s0304t0:402_1: Pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viyāti nāḷiyantaṃ yojetvā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale pappaṭakojaṃ uddhaṃ mukhaṃ katvā ākaḍḍhanto viya.
tika-s0304t0:403_1: Sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hotīti sabbameva paccayajātaṃ āvāsadāyakena dinnameva hoti.
tika-s0304t0:403_2: Tathā hi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassapi chāyūdakasampannaṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nhāyitvā
tika-s0304t0:403_3: paṭissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0304t0:403_4: Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi kilamati,
tika-s0304t0:403_5: paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nisinnassa visabhāgasantati vūpasammati,
tika-s0304t0:403_8: bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭakā vijjhanti,
tika-s0304t0:403_11: paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa pana sabbepete parissayā na honti.
tika-s0304t0:403_13: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa upasamasukhaṃ uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:403_14: Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye sedā muccanti,
tika-s0304t0:403_17: muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti,
tika-s0304t0:403_19: Etasmiñca āvāse vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0304t0:403_24: Mātukucchi asambādhova hotīti ayamattho antimabhavikānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhivasena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0304t0:404_0: Sītanti ajjhattaṃ dhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhā utuvipariṇāmavasena vā uppajjanakasītaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:404_4: Yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ ābādho na hanati,
tika-s0304t0:404_6: Sītuṇhabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0304t0:404_8: Guttasenāsanañhi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā na honti.
tika-s0304t0:404_9: Sarīsapeti ye keci sarantā gacchante dīghajātike sappādike aññe ca tathārūpe.
tika-s0304t0:404_12: Sisireti sītakālavasena sattāhavaddalikādivasena ca uppanne sisirasamphasse.
tika-s0304t0:404_13: Vuṭṭhiyoti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanatīti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:405_0: Vātātapo ghoroti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ubbahanabhañjanādivasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajaarajādibhedo vāto ceva
tika-s0304t0:405_5: Jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanibandhitvā samādahanavasena jhāyituṃ.
tika-s0304t0:406_3: Vāsayettha bahussuteti kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya.
tika-s0304t0:406_4: Te nivāsento pana tesaṃ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti.
tika-s0304t0:406_5: Evaṃ annañca pānañca vatthasenāsanāni ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu ajjhāsayasampannesu kammaphalānaṃ ratanattayaguṇānañca saddahanena vippasannena cetasā.
tika-s0304t0:406_6: Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ “te tassā”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0304t0:406_9: Dhammaṃ desentīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhapanūdanaṃ niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ kathenti.
tika-s0304t0:406_10: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti so puggalo yaṃ saddhammaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sammāpaṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamena anāsavo hutvā parinibbāyati.
tika-s0304t0:407_3: satthu dhammadesanāya appāvaseso majjhimayāmo gatoti pāḷiyaṃ “bahudeva ratti”nti vuttanti āha “atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāma”nti.
tika-s0304t0:407_5: Buddhānañhi bhattānumodanāpi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuccamānā dīghamajjhimapamāṇāpi hoti.
tika-s0304t0:408_0: Sandassetvātiādīsu sandassetvā āvāsadānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā.
tika-s0304t0:408_4: itipi paññāti sīlādiguṇe tesaṃ sammā dassetvā hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhato pakāsetvā.
tika-s0304t0:408_6: sīle patiṭṭhitena evaṃ samādhipaññā bhāvetabbāti yathā te sīlādiguṇe sammā ādiyanti,
tika-s0304t0:408_9: samathavipassanā ca bhāviyamānā yathā suṭṭhu visodhitā uparūpari visesāvahā honti,
tika-s0304t0:408_11: Sampahaṃsetvāti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ṭhitasīlādiguṇehi sampati paṭiladdhaguṇānisaṃsehi ceva upariladdhabbaphalavisesehi
tika-s0304t0:408_12: ca cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā laddhassāsavasena suṭṭhu tosetvā.
tika-s0304t0:408_14: Sakyarājāno yebhuyyena bhagavato dhammadesanāya sāsane laddhassādā laddhappatiṭṭhā ca.
tika-s0304t0:410_0: Tatra kirātiādi kecivādoti baddhopi na hoti.
tika-s0304t0:411_2: bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniko sabrahmacārī,
tika-s0304t0:411_3: tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:412_0: Piṭṭhivāto uppajji upādinnasarīrassa tathārūpattā saṅkhārānañca aniccatāya dukkhānubandhattā.
tika-s0304t0:412_3: Ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ pahoti yathā taṃ veluvagāmake.
tika-s0304t0:412_4: Ettake ṭhāneti ettake ṭhāne ṭhānaṃ nipphannanti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:416_4: kā dukkhadhammāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “pañcasu hī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:416_15: Anubandhitvāti ca vīthicittappavattito paṭṭhāya yāva tatiyajavanavārā anu anu bandhitvā.
tika-s0304t0:417_3: Nāmapadaṃ nāma kiriyāpadāpekkhanti “vijjhī”ti vacanasesena kiriyāpadaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0304t0:418_3: Kāci kilesāti cuddasavidhe cittassa kicce javanakicce eva cittakilesānaṃ uppattiṃ katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:418_6: Cakkhudvārasminti pāḷiyaṃ tassa paṭhamaṃ gahitatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:418_9: Satisammosena “kilesā me uppannā”ti ñatvā tathā paccāmāsasatiyā labbhanato. Tenāha –
tika-s0304t0:418_12: Āvajjanādīsūti tato eva ayoniso āvajjanādīsu uppannesu iṭṭhārammaṇassa laddhattā paccayasiddhiyā sampattaṃ pavattanārahaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:418_14: Kathaṃ panassa evaṃ laddhuṃ sakkāti āha “āraddhavipassakānaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t0:418_15: Bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāneti bhāvanāyaṃ paṭisaṅkhāne ca yogino patiṭṭhitabhāvo.
tika-s0304t0:418_17: yaṃ paccayalābhena uppajjituṃ laddhokāsāpi kilesā pubbe pavattabhāvanānubhāvena vikkhambhitā tathā tathā niggahitā eva hutvā nivattanti,
tika-s0304t0:422_1: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena vividhadassananti kiccavasena nānādassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:422_3: Tayidaṃ uparimaggesu bhāvanāpariyāyassa niruḷhattā paṭhamamaggassa paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato.
tika-s0304t0:422_5: Koci yathāvuttaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānanto ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma ārammaṇakaraṇassa vasena atippasaṅgaṃ āsaṅkeyyāti
tika-s0304t0:422_7: Na dassananti vuccatīti ettha rājadassanaṃ udāharanti.
tika-s0304t0:422_9: bhāvanāpariyāyo pana upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ paṭhamamaggaupāyassa bhāvanākārena pavattanato.
tika-s0304t0:423_2: cakkhuviññāṇādike taṃsahagatadhammamatte diṭṭhe arūpapariggaho ca sijjhatīti vadanti.
tika-s0304t0:424_0: Adhigatamaggameva kathesīti yena mukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0304t0:424_4: “Aññamaññaṃ na sametī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti “paṭhamenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t0:426_5: Jhāmathuṇo viyāti daḍḍhathuṇo viya khārakajālanaddhattā taruṇamakulasantānasañchannattā.
tika-s0304t0:427_5: Yasmā tassa rukkhassa sākhā aviraḷā ghanappattā aññamaññaṃ saṃsanditvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0304t0:427_6: tasmā chāyāpissa tādisīti vuttaṃ “sandacchāyo nāma saṃsanditvā ṭhitacchāyo”ti,
tika-s0304t0:428_0: Yena yenākārena adhimuttānanti chaphassāyatanādimukhena yena yena vipassanābhinivesena vipassantānaṃ nibbānañca adhimuttānaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:428_3: Idāni taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ upamāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:429_1: Taṃ sallakkhitanti kiṃsukopamadīpitaṃ atthajātaṃ sace sallakkhitaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:429_3: Dhammadesanatthanti yathāsallakkhitassa atthassa vasena laddhavisesassa upabrūhanāya.
tika-s0304t0:429_6: Tipurisubbedhānīti ubbedhena tipurisappamāṇāni nānābhittivicittāni thambhānaṃ upari vividhamālākammādivicittadhanurākāralakkhitāni manoramāni.
tika-s0304t0:429_12: tatthāpi ca imehi nagarassa nagarasāmikassa ca attho.
tika-s0304t0:429_13: Imesaṃ vasena anattho siyā”ti jānanañāṇasaṅkhātena paṇḍiccena samannāgato.
tika-s0304t0:430_2: Katipāheyevāti katipayadivaseyeva akiccakaraṇena tassa ṭhānaṃ vibbhamo jātoti katvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0304t0:431_0: Sīsamassa chindāhīti sīsabhūtaṃ uttamaṅgaṭṭhāniyaṃ tattha tassa rājakiccaṃ chindāti attho.
tika-s0304t0:431_1: Aññathā tassa pākatike atthe gayhamāne pāṇātipāto āṇatto nāma siyā.
tika-s0304t0:431_4: Atha vā chindāhīti mama āṇāya assa sīsaṃ chindanto viya attānaṃ dassehi,
tika-s0304t0:433_0: Tassevāti sakkāyasaṅkhātassa nagarassa “dvārānī”ti vuttānīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0304t0:433_2: Hadayavatthurūpassa majjhe siṅghāṭakabhāvena gahitattā “hadayavatthussa nissayabhūtānaṃ mahābhūtāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:433_4: tadevettha aggahetvā kasmā mahābhūtaggahaṇanti āha “vatthurūpassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t0:433_5: Yādisoti sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena yādiso eva pubbe āgatavipassanāmaggo.
tika-s0304t0:433_6: “Ayampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā tādiso evā”ti vatvā ariyamaggo “yathāgatamaggo”ti vutto.
tika-s0304t0:433_7: Idaṃ tāvetthāti ettha etasmiṃ sutte dhammadesanatthaṃ ābhatāya yathāvuttaupamāya idaṃ saṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:434_0: Idaṃ saṃsandananti idāni vakkhamānaṃ upamāya saṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:434_1: Nagarasāmiupamā pañcakkhandhavasena dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatā.
tika-s0304t0:434_2: Siṅghāṭakūpamā catumahābhūtavasena dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatāti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:434_3: “Catusaccameva kathita”nti vatvā tāni saccāni niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “sakalenapi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:434_6: Te pana dukkhasaccapariyāpannāti vuttaṃ “nagarasambhārena dukkhasaccameva kathita”nti.
tika-s0304t0:437_1: Bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vāti kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ parisādvayameva gahitaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:437_2: sesaparisānaṃ pana tadaññesampi devamanussānanti sabbasādhāraṇovāyaṃ dhammasaṅgahoti imamatthaṃ upamāpubbakaṃ
tika-s0304t0:438_15: Yasmā pana sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā dvādasākusalacittuppādapariyāpannā eva,
tika-s0304t0:438_16: tasmā tesampettha gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “chando rāgoti vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:439_8: Na sakkā sampattibhavaṃ gantuṃ kuto nibbānagamananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t0:440_2: Cittaṃ nivattati sarāgacittaṃ na uppajjati paṭipakkhamanasikārena vinoditattā.
tika-s0304t0:441_1: evaṃ kiṭṭhasambhavattā “kiṭṭha”nti vuttanti āha “kiṭṭhanti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassa”nti.
tika-s0304t0:442_0: Ghaṭāti siṅgayugaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “dvinnaṃ siṅgānaṃ antare”ti.
tika-s0304t0:444_2: tathābhūtañca tajjitaṃ nāma hotīti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:445_4: Koṇanti kavaṇato vīṇāya saddakaraṇato koṇanti laddhanāmaṃ dārudaṇḍaṃ siṅgādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ ghaṭikaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:446_0: Yasmā so rājā rājamahāmatto vā saddaṃ yathāsabhāvato na aññāsi,
tika-s0304t0:446_1: tasmiṃ tassa ajānanākārameva dassetuṃ “saddaṃ passissāmī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:447_0: Asatī kirāyanti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti yathāliṅgameva vadanto “asā”ti āha.
tika-s0304t0:447_1: “Asatīti lāmakādhivacana”nti vatvā tattha payogaṃ dassetuṃ “asā lokitthiyo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:447_4: Pakatiyā loke jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭhabhātā mātulotiādikā velā mariyādā tāsaṃ na vijjati. Kasmā?
tika-s0304t0:447_5: Sārattā ca pagabbā ca sabbesampi sambhogavasena viniyogaṃ gacchanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0304t0:452_0: Taṃ pana gatiṃ sattānaṃ saṃvegavatthubhūtassa paccakkhassa gabbhāsayassa vasena dassetuṃ “ayamassa kāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:452_2: tato paraṃ aññaṃ kiñci natthīti salakkhaṇagati.
tika-s0304t0:452_8: Salakkhaṇavibhavagatibhedagatiyo “eseva nayo”ti imināva pakāsitāti na gahitā.
tika-s0304t0:452_9: Tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti aggamaggena samucchinnattā.
tika-s0304t0:456_7: veditabbo guṇasarīrassa khaṇḍachiddasīlādīhi heṭṭhā majjhe uparibhāge ca bhedavisamacchinnavikāradosattā.
tika-s0304t0:457_0: Gāmavāsīnaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhenāti nārahova hutvā tesaṃ kārānaṃ paṭiggahaṇavasena pīḷanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0304t0:459_1: Maṇḍalaṃ bandhitvāti yathā sarīraṃ maṇḍalākārena tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0304t0:460_0: Cha pāṇakā viya cha āyatanāni nānajjhāsayattā,
tika-s0304t0:460_3: Majjhe gaṇṭhi viya avijjā bandhanassa dubbinimmocanahetuto.
tika-s0304t0:460_4: Ārammaṇaṃ balavaṃ hoti manuññabhāvena ceva tattha taṇhābhinivesassa daḷhabhāvena ca.
tika-s0304t0:462_2: Paccayo hotīti upanissayo hoti tena vinā saddaggahaṇassa abhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:462_3: “Ajaṭākāsopi vaṭṭati evā”ti vatvā tassa paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “antoleṇasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:463_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ bhūtaparamparāvasena sadde sotapathamāgacchante.
tika-s0304t0:463_2: Ghānādīnaṃ viya “dūre saddo”ti jānanaṃ na sambhaveyya sampattagāhibhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:463_3: Tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti manoviññāṇassa gahaṇākāravisesato.
tika-s0304t0:463_5: Dūre ṭhitopi saddo tādise ṭhāne paṭighosādīnaṃ paccayo hoti ayokanto viya ayocalanassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:463_8: Tato tato savanaṃ hoti ākāsasaññitassa upanissayassa labbhanato.
tika-s0304t0:463_11: Paṭṭhāne ca avisesena “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vutto,
tika-s0304t0:463_12: bahiddhā ca cittajassa saddassa sambhavo natthi.
tika-s0304t0:463_13: Atha vā cittajo saddo dhātuparamparāya sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-s0304t0:463_18: tattha ṭhitova sotapasādassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:465_4: Na sakkā kheḷena atemitassa rasaṃ jānituṃ,
tika-s0304t0:466_2: Kāyapasādasannissayabhūtāya pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe ghaṭite eva tattha viññāṇuppatti,
tika-s0304t0:467_1: Tena manassa makkaṭassa viya anavaṭṭhitataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:471_3: Potheyyunti yathā yavasaṅkhātaṃ dhaññaṃ vaṇṭato muccati,
tika-s0304t0:471_5: Yave sāvetvāti yavasīsato yave pothanena mocetvā vivecetvā.
tika-s0304t0:472_0: Catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni ārammaṇadaṇḍakehi hananaṭṭhānattā.
tika-s0304t0:472_2: Cha byābhaṅgiyo viya sabhāvato chadhāpi paccekaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavasena aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇāni yavakalāpaṭṭhāniyassa sattassa hananato.
tika-s0304t0:472_4: Bhavapatthanā ca tassa paccayabhūtā kilesā cāti bhavapatthanākilesāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t0:472_5: Yasmā sattānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nāma sabbampi taṃ bhavapatthanāmūlakaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:474_5: Kilesamārena baddhoti kilesamārena teneva kilesabandhanena baddho.
tika-s0304t0:475_0: Taṇhāmaññanāya sati diṭṭhimānamaññanānaṃ pasaṅgo eva natthīti yathā “asmī”ti padena diṭṭhimānamaññanā vuttā honti,
tika-s0304t0:475_1: evaṃ taṇhāmaññitāpīti vuttaṃ “asmīti padena taṇhāmaññitaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0304t0:475_11: tasmā imehi taṇhādīhi kilesehi pākaṭacalanavasena iñjanti ceva,
tika-s0304t0:476_8: Tathā hi paṭṭhāne “saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”ti ettha saṃyojanāni
tika-s0304t0:476_9: saṃyojanehi yathālābhaṃ yojetvā dassitayojanāya “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana”nti
tika-s0304t0:476_11: “mānasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana”nti ca vatvā “bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:476_12: Ettha ca kāmarāgabhavarāgasaṃyojanehi mānassa aniyatabhāvo pakāsito.
tika-s0304t0:476_15: Balavataṇhāsampayutto hi māno sayampi balavā hutvā asmīti savisesaṃ majjanavasena pavattatīti.
tika-s0304t0:477_1: “Seyyohamasmī”tiādinā hi bahulamānupetassa puggalassa rūpādīsu ekaṃ uddissa ayamahamasmīti diṭṭhiyā uppannāya
tika-s0304t0:477_2: mānassa appahīnattā mānopi tattha tattheva uppajjati.
tika-s0304t0:477_3: Iti mānamūlakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sandhāyāha “ayamahamasmīti diṭṭhivasena vutta”nti.
tika-s0304t0:477_4: Codako pana imamatthaṃ ajānanto anupalabbhamānameva sampayogatthaṃ gahetvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0304t0:477_5: Itaro “āma natthī”ti tamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “mānassa panā”tiādinā parihāramāha.
tika-s0304t0:483_1: Vedanā ca pajānātīti saccābhisambodhavasena vuccamānavedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ sātisayasamādhānapubbakanti
tika-s0304t0:483_2: bhagavatā “samāhito”ti vuttanti āha “upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhito”ti.
tika-s0304t0:483_11: Nibbānaṃ ārabbha ariyamaggappavattiyā hi nibbānaṃ vedanānirodhoti vutto.
tika-s0304t0:483_14: Chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā kāmānaṃ pātukāmatāvasena pavattanato,
tika-s0304t0:483_15: accantameva samucchinnattā natthi etasmiṃ chātanti nicchāto.
tika-s0304t0:486_5: Saparasantānagate sandhāya ajjhattabahiddhāgahaṇanti āha “attano ca parassa cā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:486_10: Ñāṇena phusitvā phusitvāti pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇena aniccā pabhaṅgunoti ārammaṇato,
tika-s0304t0:486_11: uttarakālaṃ asammohato maggaparamparāya phusitvā phusitvā vayaṃ passanto.
tika-s0304t0:486_14: Lokiyalokuttarehi ñāṇehi yāthāvato parijānanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ ñāṇaphusanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:489_1: Sabbampi aṭṭhasatapabhedaṃ taṇhaṃ chindi samucchedapahānavasena pajahi.
tika-s0304t0:489_6: Pahānañca nāma upāyena ñāyena pahānanti āha “hetunā kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:489_8: Arahattamaggo hi uppajjamānova sabhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ mohaṃ viddhaṃsento eva pavattati,
tika-s0304t0:489_9: tena māno yāthāvato diṭṭho nāma hoti,
tika-s0304t0:489_11: Yathā hi sūriye uṭṭhite andhakāro viddhaṃsiyamāno vihato,
tika-s0304t0:489_12: evaṃ arahattamagge uppajjamāne so sabbaso pahīno eva hoti,
tika-s0304t0:490_4: Aduṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ paricchedaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca akāsīti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:491_0: Na riñcatīti na viveceti na vissajjeti.
tika-s0304t0:491_3: Saṅkhyaṃ nopetīti imassa “diṭṭhadhamme anāsavo”ti imassa vasena atthaṃ vadanto “ratto duṭṭho”ti avoca saupādisesanibbānavasena.
tika-s0304t0:491_5: dhamme anāsavo dhammaṭṭho vedagū kāyassa bhedā manusso devoti vā paññattiṃ na upetīti anupādisesanibbānavasenapi attho vattabbo.
tika-s0304t0:491_6: Ettha ca sukhādīsu vedanāsu yathākkamaṃ rāgānusayādayo kathitāti āha –
tika-s0304t0:491_8: Yo hi rāgādi paccayasamavāye atiiṭṭhādīsu uppajjanāraho maggena appahīno,
tika-s0304t0:494_1: Yattha patiṭṭhā natthi ekantikāti ekantikassa mahato pātassa alanti ayamettha attho adhippetoti āha “natthi ettha patiṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:494_6: Yasmā samuddapiṭṭhe antarantarā verambhavātasadiso mahāvāto uṭṭhahitvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ uggacchāpeti,
tika-s0304t0:494_10: Vegena pakkhanditvāti mahatā vātavegena samuddhataṃ teneva vegena pakkhandantañca hutvā.
tika-s0304t0:495_3: “Assutavā puthujjano”ti vatvā “sutavā ariyasāvako”ti vuttattā “sotāpanno dhura”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:498_9: Svāyaṃ hutvā abhāvākāro itarāsupi vedanāsu labbhateva,
tika-s0304t0:498_11: Dukkhatāvasena purimānaṃ vedanānaṃ daṭṭhabbatāya dassitattā pacchimāya vedanāya evaṃ daṭṭhabbatā dassitā.
tika-s0304t0:501_4: Evamevāti yathā viddhassa purisassa anuvedhanā balavatarā, evameva.
tika-s0304t0:501_13: Imasmimpi sutte purimasutte viya ārammaṇānusayova kathito,
tika-s0304t0:504_5: Aniccataṃ anupassantoti kāyaṃ paṭicca uppannāya vedanāya ca aniccataṃ anupassanto.
tika-s0304t0:508_1: Phassaṃ paṭiccāti ettha phassasīsena phassāyatanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:508_2: Na hi phassāyatanehi vinā phassassa sambhavo.
tika-s0304t0:511_2: So panesa hitabhāvo paccayabhāvenāti āha “sukhavedanāya paccayabhūta”nti.
tika-s0304t0:511_3: Imasmimpi suttadvayeti imasmiṃ navame dasame ca suttepi.
tika-s0304t0:516_1: Yaṃkiñci vedayitanti “sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukha”nti vuttaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:516_4: Yā esātiādīsu yo saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatāsaṅkhāto hutvā abhāvākāro,
tika-s0304t0:516_5: yā khayasabhāvatā vinassanasabhāvatā jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmanasabhāvatā,
tika-s0304t0:516_6: etaṃ sandhāya uddissa sabbaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhanti mayā vuttanti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0304t0:516_9: Tāsaṃ aniccatā ca nāma maraṇaṃ bhaṅgoti katvā tato uttari dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti sabbā vedanā “dukkhā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0304t0:519_4: Anussativasenāti nidassanamattaṃ aññassapi upacārajjhānaggahitassa savitakkacārassa nirāmisassa sukhassa labbhanato.
tika-s0304t0:519_7: Kāmahetu dukkhappattānaṃ dukkhavedanā kāmāmisena sāmisā vedanā.
tika-s0304t0:519_9: “Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti evaṃ pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato tasmiṃ anijjhamāne pihappaccayā uppannadomanassavedanā.
tika-s0304t0:519_11: Savisesaṃ pana dassetuṃ “catutthajjhānavasena uppannā adukkhamasukhavedanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:522_4: Purimāni dve “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hotī”tiādinā nayena yāva khīṇāsavassa kilesapaṭippassaddhi,
tika-s0304t0:526_0: Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti pucchānusandhiādīhi visuṃ tehi asammisso eko anusandhi.
tika-s0304t0:526_6: etasmā sukhā aññaṃ sukha”ntiādiṃ vadanto thapatino vādaṃ upatthambheti nāma.
tika-s0304t0:527_1: Nirodhasamāpattiṃ sīsaṃ katvāti nirodhasamāpattidesanāya sīsaṃ uttamaṃ katvā.
tika-s0304t0:527_2: Desanāya uddesādhimutte uṭṭhāpetvā vitthāritattā “neyyapuggalassa vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:532_1: Cūḷā pana assa mahatī atthi savisesā,
tika-s0304t0:532_5: “Tisso vedanā”ti vatvā tāsaṃ sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:532_7: Pittabhesajjaṃ karissāmīti bhesajjasambharaṇatthañceva tadatthaṃ āmisakiñjakkhasambharaṇatthañca pāṇaṃ hanatīti yojanā.
tika-s0304t0:533_0: Tasmāti yasmā pittādipaccayahetukanti attano ca lokassa ca paccakkhaṃ atidhāvanti ye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā,
tika-s0304t0:534_9: tassā pana paccuppannapaccayavasena evamayaṃ lokavohāroti vuttañceva gahetvā paravādapaṭisedho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:537_2: tassa aṭṭhasatassa tabbhāvassa pariyāyo kāraṇaṃ ettha atthīti aṭṭhasatapariyāyo, suttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:538_7: Kāmaguṇā hi idha gehanissitadhammena gehapariyāyena vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:539_3: Sammappaññāya passatoti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca yāthāvato passato.
tika-s0304t0:539_7: Tadāyatananti taṃ āyatanaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ arahattaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:540_7: Rūpaṃ sā nātivattati na atikkamati ñāṇasampayuttābhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:540_9: Tatiyādīni yāva dasamā heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0304t0:543_4: Sā hi pīti sabbaso santakilesāmise santāne pavattiyā accantasabhāvadhammārammaṇavisayatāya sayampi sātisayaṃ
tika-s0304t0:544_0: Vimokkhavāro pana na atidiṭṭho itarehi visadisattā.
tika-s0304t0:544_3: Sāmiso nāma yasmā sāmisarūpapaṭibaddhavutti ceva sāmisarūpapaṭibhāgañca,
tika-s0304t0:544_6: Arūpāmisassa abhāvato arūpapaṭisaṃyutto vimokkho nirāmiso nāma.
tika-s0304t0:549_7: Ñātikulato aññato vā āgatāya bhogasampadāya abhāvena na bhogasampanno.
tika-s0304t0:549_11: Pajañcassa na labhatīti pajābhāvasīsena tassā parivārahāni vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:552_1: Āveṇitabbato mariyādāya visuṃ asādhāraṇato passitabbato āveṇikāni.
tika-s0304t0:559_3: Balāni hi sattānaṃ vuḍḍhiyā upatthambhakapaccayo hoti,
tika-s0304t0:562_2: Nāsentīti nāsanaṃ adassanaṃ nenti nīharantīti attho.
tika-s0304t0:565_1: Nibbānaṃ āgammāti ettha āgammāti sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho.
tika-s0304t0:565_2: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena
tika-s0304t0:565_3: vimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādike khepetīti
tika-s0304t0:565_4: taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvato “nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgo khīyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:566_3: Addhā attanoti vakkhati “parassa kilesakkhayena parassa nibbānasampatti na yuttā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:566_4: Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayappattitā ca āpannāti āha –
tika-s0304t0:566_6: Nanu ārammaṇakaraṇamattena kilesakkhayo anuppattoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0304t0:566_9: Gotrabhūpi maggena yā kilesānaṃ anuppattidhammatā kātabbā,
tika-s0304t0:566_12: Na hi aññe dhammā viya nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:566_13: taṃ pana atigambhīrattā appattena ālambituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0304t0:566_14: tasmā tena gotrabhunā pattabbena tikālikasabhāvātikkantagambhīrabhāvena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:566_15: kilesakkhayamattataṃ vā icchato gotrabhuto puretaraṃ nipphannena kilesakkhayena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:566_16: Appattakilesakkhayārammaṇakaraṇe hi sati gotrabhuto puretaracittānipi ālambeyyunti.
tika-s0304t0:567_2: Rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammātiādīsūti ādisaddena lokuttaraanāsavādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t0:567_5: Kilesakkhayamattatāya hi sati nibbānassa bahutā āpajjati “yattakā kilesā khīyanti,
tika-s0304t0:567_7: Abhāvassabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvo asaṅkhatādibhāvo ca na siyā,
tika-s0304t0:567_10: Yasmā ca sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vā samucchedavasena kilese pajahituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0304t0:567_11: yato mahaggatañāṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ vā kilesavikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgavasena vā pajahati,
tika-s0304t0:567_12: tasmā ariyamaggañāṇassa sammutisaccasaṅkhatadhammārammaṇehi viparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:567_13: Tathā hi taṃ samucchedavasena kilese pajahīti evaṃ parinipphannāsaṅkhatasabhāvaṃ nibbānanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
tika-s0304t0:570_1: Pahāya gatattāti ariyamaggena jahitvā ñāṇagamanena gatattā.
tika-s0304t0:570_2: Suṭṭhu gatāti sammā gatā paṭipannāti sugatā.
tika-s0304t0:570_4: Dukkhasaṅkhātoti “dukkha”nti saṅkhātabbo viditabbo ca dukkhasabhāvo dhammo dukkhadukkhatā.
tika-s0304t0:570_5: Yasmā dukkhavedanāvinimuttasaṅkhatadhamme sukhavedanāya ca yathā idha saṅkhāradukkhatā vipariṇāmadukkhatāti dukkhapariyāyo niruppateva,
tika-s0304t0:570_6: tasmā dukkhasabhāvo dhammo ekena dukkhasaddena visesetvā vutto “dukkhadukkhatā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:575_3: Iminā hi dve saṃyuttāni pāḷito atthato ca aññamaññaṃ sadisānevāti dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:577_1: Kāmasahagatesu saññāmanasikāresu upaṭṭhahantesu byāpādādisahagatāpi saññāmanasikārā yathāpaccayaṃ upaṭṭhahantiyevāti
tika-s0304t0:580_9: tāva vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanamanuyuñjantopi yathārahaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ suññataṃ cetosamādhiṃ anuyutto viharatīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:583_3: So pana kenaci asaṃhāriyo asampavedhīti āha “acalappasādenā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:586_0: 343. Bhogagāmanti bhoguppattigāmaṃ. Pavattatīti appaṭihataṃ hutvā pavattati paṭisambhidappattiyā.
tika-s0304t0:589_2: Upāsako theresu byākātuṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ byākātukāmo pucchati,
tika-s0304t0:589_4: Paṭhamavacanena abyākaronte disvāva punappunaṃ pucchitaṃ viheso viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “vihesetī”ti.
tika-s0304t0:595_1: Tesaṃ anujānantoti tesaṃ dāsakammakarānaṃ sesake yathāruci vicāraṇaṃ anujānanto.
tika-s0304t0:596_1: Abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvāti samantato chādanavasena maṇḍapaṃ viya meghapaṭalaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0304t0:596_3: Ekamekaṃ phusitakaṃ phusāyatu jālavinaddhaṃ viya vassatu.
tika-s0304t0:596_4: Evaṃ vuttappakārena nānāparikammaṃ nānādhiṭṭhānaṃ ekato parikammaṃ ekato adhiṭṭhānanti catukkamettha sambhavatīti dasseti “ettha cā”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t0:596_5: Yathā tathāti yathāvuttesu catūsu pakāresu yena vā tena vā pakārena karontassa.
tika-s0304t0:596_6: Kataparikammassāti “evaṃ vā evaṃ vā hotū”ti pavattitaparikammacittassa.
tika-s0304t0:599_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dosābhāvameva dassetuṃ “nelaṅgoti niddoso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:599_8: Etaṃ bhikkhuṃ āgacchantanti mahākappinattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:599_9: Attano diṭṭhena kathesīti attano sabbaññutaññāṇena paccakkhato upalakkhitena atthena kathesi.
tika-s0304t0:599_10: Ayaṃ pana nayaggāhenāti ayaṃ pana gahapati asutvā kevalaṃ nayaggāhena āha.
tika-s0304t0:603_0: Padatthaṃ pucchati itarasaṅkhārehi padatthato visesaṃ kathāpessāmīti.
tika-s0304t0:603_1: Kāyanissitāti ettha kāyanissitatā ca nesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitāya veditabbā,
tika-s0304t0:603_2: na kāyassa nissayapaccayatāvasenāti dassento “kāye sati honti,
tika-s0304t0:603_5: Cittanissitāti cittaṃ nissāya taṃ nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā uppannā.
tika-s0304t0:604_0: “Samāpajjāmī”ti padassa samīpe vuccamānaṃ “samāpajjissa”nti padaṃ āsannānāgatakālavācī eva bhavituṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:605_1: Anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanasaṅkhātāya nirodhabhāvanāya taṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0304t0:605_4: Tattha anuppajjanato anuppādanato heṭṭhā nirodhoti adhippeto.
tika-s0304t0:605_5: Catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ tajjā parikammasiddhā yā appavatti,
tika-s0304t0:606_0: “Cittasaṅkhāro niruddho”ti vacanato tadaññesaṃ anirodhaṃ icchantānaṃ vādaṃ dassento “cittasaṅkhāro niruddhoti
tika-s0304t0:606_1: vacanato”tiādiṃ vatvā tattha atippasaṅgadassanamukhena taṃ vādaṃ nisedhetuṃ “te vattabbā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0304t0:606_2: Abhinivesaṃ akatvāti yathāgate byañjanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0304t0:606_3: Ācariyānaṃ nayeti ācariyānaṃ paramparāgate dhammanaye dhammanettiyaṃ ṭhatvā.
tika-s0304t0:607_5: Makkhitāni viyāti puñchitāni viya honti ghaṭṭanāya vibādhitattā.
tika-s0304t0:607_6: Etenāyaṃ ghaṭṭanā pañcadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ vegasā uppajjanāya na ārammaṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0304t0:608_0: Tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti idaṃ atthato āpannaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0304t0:608_1: “ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmī”ti eteneva tassa atthassa siddhattā.
tika-s0304t0:608_2: Yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitanti ettha visuṃ cittassa bhāvanā nāma natthi,
tika-s0304t0:608_3: addhānaparicchedaṃ pana katvā nirodhasamāpattatthāya kātabbaparikammabhāvanāya eva tassa sijjhanato.
tika-s0304t0:609_2: Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti tiṇṇaṃ kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā.
tika-s0304t0:609_4: aṭṭhannañca maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena imāhi soḷasahi ñāṇappavattīhi.
tika-s0304t0:609_5: Navahi samādhicariyāhīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā,
tika-s0304t0:609_6: tāsaṃ upacārasamādhi samādhibhāvasāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṃ navahi samādhicariyāhi.
tika-s0304t0:609_13: atha kimatthametaṃ jhānasukhādiṃ viya samāpajjantīti āha “saṅkhārāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0304t0:610_5: Sā na samuṭṭhāpetīti sā catutthajjhānikā phalasamāpatti na samuṭṭhāpeti assāsapassāse.
tika-s0304t0:610_11: sañjīvattherassa pubbe samāpattikkhaṇe assāsapassāsā abbohārikabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0304t0:611_4: vacīsaṅkhāralakkhaṇappattā pana na hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “kiṃ bhavaṅga”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:612_11: phassasīsena pana desanā āgatāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:613_10: Suññatā nāma attadiṭṭhiyā ujupaṭipakkhattā sattasuññatāya sudiṭṭhattā.
tika-s0304t0:613_16: Yasmā pana sā maggavuṭṭhānakāle evarūpāpi hotīti tassa vasena maggaphalānaṃ viya phassassapi pavattirūpattā yathāvutto vikappo anavasaroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:613_18: Na hi ekaṃyeva puggalaṃ etasmiṃ khaṇe tayo phassā phusanti.
tika-s0304t0:613_20: Yasmā pana “nirodhaphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassā”tiādi yassa yathāvuttā tayo eva phassā sambhavanti,
tika-s0304t0:614_1: Tasmiṃ viveke ekanteneva ninnapoṇattā eva hi te paṭippassaddhasabbussukkā uttamapurisā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0304t0:618_1: Nibbānampi appamāṇameva pamāṇagocarānaṃ kilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvassapi anāgamanato.
tika-s0304t0:618_6: palibuddhakaṃ vā natthi etassa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:620_6: cattāri phalāni ārammaṇavasena nibbānapaviṭṭhatāya ekatthā ekārammaṇā.
tika-s0304t0:620_7: Aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti idaṃ visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ appamāṇādi pariyāyavuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:620_9: Tasmā “aññasmi”nti idaṃ tena tena pariyāyena tattha tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:623_10: Tasmiṃ saddahanā okappanā tassa saddhātipi vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0304t0:624_1: Kucchiṃ nīharitvāti piṭṭhiyā ninnamanena kucchiṃ purato nīharitvā.
tika-s0304t0:624_2: Gīvaṃ pasāraṇavasena paggayha paggahetvā sabbaṃ disaṃ pekkhamāno.
tika-s0304t0:624_3: Sabbamidaṃ nigaṇṭhassa pahaṭṭhākāradassanatthaṃ “idāni samaṇassa gotamassa upari vādaṃ āropetuṃ labbhatī”ti.
tika-s0304t0:624_8: Eko uddesoti ekaṃ uddisanaṃ atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:624_11: Sabbatthāti sabbesu pañhuddesaveyyākaraṇesu attho vitthārato veditabbo.
tika-s0304t0:627_5: taṃ pāvaḷaṃ rajoharaṇatthaṃ nipphoṭīyati etāyāti pāvaḷanipphoṭanā,
tika-s0304t0:630_1: Mattarājā nāma eko bhummadevo bhūtādhipati surāpotalarukkhanivāsī.
tika-s0304t0:630_7: Tena hīti yasmā taṃ devāpi āsannamaraṇaṃ maññanti,
tika-s0304t0:630_9: taṃ tumhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t0:633_1: “Yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ pañhapucchanena dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi caṇḍoti gahitanāmo.
tika-s0304t0:636_7: Tathā hesa asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro jāto.
tika-s0304t0:637_7: abhinayāti kāmassādasaṃyuttānaṃ siṅgārahassaabbhutarasānañceva “aññe cā”ti vuttasantabībhaccharasānañca dassanakā abhinayā.
tika-s0304t0:637_14: Te hi rase sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “ye dhammā rajanīyā,
tika-s0304t0:638_1: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ niraye paccanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0304t0:638_4: Yathā loke atthavisesavasena sakammakānipi padāni akammakāni bhavanti “vimuccati puriso”ti,
tika-s0304t0:638_5: evaṃ idha atthavisesavasena akammakaṃ sakammakaṃ katvā vuttaṃ – “nāhaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0304t0:638_12: Tamevassa sakammakabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ atthavisesaṃ “na assuvimocanamattenā”ti vuttaṃ. Mataṃ vā, amma,
tika-s0304t0:641_4: ussāhaṃ vāyāmaṃ karotīti yujjhanavasena ussāhaṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti.
tika-s0304t0:641_7: Duṭṭhu ṭhapitanti duṭṭhākārena attano paresañca atthāvahabhāvaṃ na gataṃ paṭipannaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:641_8: Parehi saṅgāme jitā hatā ettha jāyantīti parajito nāma nirayo.
tika-s0304t0:641_10: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ yodhājīvaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0304t0:641_13: Eseva nayoti eso tatiye vutto eva atthato visesābhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:644_2: Udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthāyāti attano udakasuddhikabhāvaṃ jānanatthañceva lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotīti imassa atthassa jānanatthañca.
tika-s0304t0:644_4: Sammā ñāpentīti sammā ujukaṃyeva saggaṃ lokaṃ gamenti. Tenāha –
tika-s0304t0:648_1: Bahi vissandanavasena udakaṃ na haratīti ahārī,
tika-s0304t0:648_3: Sakkaccameva desenti saddhammagāravassa sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya ca buddhānaṃ samānarasattā.
tika-s0304t0:648_4: Catasso pana parisā satthugāravena attano ca saddhāsampannatāya saddahitvā okappetvā suṇanti,
tika-s0304t0:648_6: Kiccasiddhiyā satthu desanā tattha sakkaccadesanā nāma jātā.
tika-s0304t0:651_2: sabbo so āpāyiko”ti vatvā puna “yaṃbahulaṃ yaṃbahulaṃ karoti,
tika-s0304t0:651_3: tena duggatiṃ gacchatī”ti vadanto attanāva attano vādaṃ bhindati.
tika-s0304t0:651_4: Evaṃ santeti yadi bahuso katena pāpakammena āpāyiko,
tika-s0304t0:651_6: Cattāri padānīti “yo koci pāṇamatipātetī”tiādinā nayena vuttā cattāro atthakoṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0304t0:651_7: Diṭṭhiyā paccayā honti “atthi kho pana mayā”tiādinā ayoniso ummujjantassa.
tika-s0304t0:651_13: Tathā hi taṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamatthatāya dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca “mahaggata”nti vuccati.
tika-s0304t0:652_1: mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:652_2: tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ohīyitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0304t0:652_3: mahaggatakammameva pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato.
tika-s0304t0:652_12: Yathānusandhināva gatanti yathānusandhisaṅkhātaanusandhinā osānaṃ gataṃ saṃkilesasammukhena uṭṭhitāya vodānadhammavasena niṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0304t0:655_8: Evaṃ sante “kasmā evaṃ dubbhikkhe kāle mahatiyā parisāya parivuto janapadacārikaṃ carantā kulūpacchedāya
tika-s0304t0:655_9: paṭipajjathā”ti evaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ vādaṃ āropehīti gāmaṇiṃ uyyojesi.
tika-s0304t0:656_1: Bahi nīharitunti na vaṇṇemi vaṇṇemīti dve ante mocento taṃ pucchitamatthaṃ bahi nīharati nāma.
tika-s0304t0:656_2: Tattha dosaṃ datvā codento taṃ apucchaṃ karonto gilitvā viya anto paveseti nāma.
tika-s0304t0:657_0: Ito so gāmaṇītiādi attano bhikkhūnaṃ aññesañca atthakāmānaṃ bhikkhappadānena aniṭṭhappattiabhāvadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:657_1: Dānena sambhūtānīti dānamayena puññakiriyavatthunā sammadeva bhūtiṃ vaḍḍhiṃ pattāni.
tika-s0304t0:657_2: Saccena ariyavohārena sammadeva bhūtāni uppannāni saccasambhūtānīti āha “saccaṃ nāma saccavāditā”ti.
tika-s0304t0:657_4: Nihitanti tasmiṃ kule pubbapurisehi nidhānabhāvena nihitaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:657_9: Tasmiṃ kule padhānapurisānaṃ bhogānaṃ vā sabbaso vināso.
tika-s0304t0:660_1: Taṃ parisanti taṃ rājantepure nisinnaṃ rājaparisaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:660_2: Nayaggāheti kutocipi asutvā kevalaṃ attano eva matiyā nayaggahaṇe ṭhatvā.
tika-s0304t0:661_2: Attano ettha kiccāvasāne yaṃ gihīnaṃyeva santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ,
tika-s0304t0:664_2: nesaṃ nivāsatāya “mallā”icceva bahuvacanavasena laddhanāmattā evaṃnāmake janapade.
tika-s0304t0:664_3: Natthi etassa pattiyā kālantarasaññito kāloti akālo,
tika-s0304t0:664_7: sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlaka”nti evaṃ vutto dukkhassa chandamūlabhāvo,
tika-s0304t0:664_8: evaṃ chandamūlakassa dukkhassa kathitattā “imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:667_2: tatrāpi antarabhedena vibhajitvā pucchitabbapañhe ekato rāsiṃ katvā.
tika-s0304t0:667_6: So pana taṃ tapaṃ nissāya ṭhito nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “tapanissitaka”nti.
tika-s0304t0:667_7: So pana anekākārabhedena lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ jīvanasīlattā lūkhajīvī nāma.
tika-s0304t0:667_9: Majjhimāya paṭipattiyā uppathabhāvena avaniyā gandhabbāti antā,
tika-s0304t0:667_22: saddo idha sarīrapariyāyo “attantapo”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sarīradukkhakaraṇanti attho”ti.
tika-s0304t0:668_2: Kāmabhogītapanissitakanijjaravatthūnaṃ dassane yathādhippetassa atthassa vibhajitvā kathanaṃ sambhavatīti te dassetvā adhippetattho kathito.
tika-s0304t0:669_4: Dhammena ca adhammena cāti dhammikena adhammikena ca.
tika-s0304t0:669_7: atha kho yoniso pavattaṃ sāsanikamevāti dassento “caturaṅgavīriyavasena cā”ti āha.
tika-s0304t0:669_8: Tattha “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”tiādinā nayena vuttā sarīrenirapekkhavipassanāya ussukkāpanavasena
tika-s0304t0:669_10: Tathā abbhokāsikanesajjikatapādinissitāva kilesanimmathanayogyā vīriyabhāvanā “dhutaṅgavasena cā”ti vuttāti.
tika-s0304t0:669_12: Sā ca attapaccakkhatāya sandiṭṭhikā tiṇṇaṃ mūlakilesānaṃ pajahanena “tisso”ti ca vuttā.
tika-s0304t0:672_2: bhagavato pana māyāsāṭheyyādikassa sabbassa pāpadhammassa bodhimūle eva setughāto,
tika-s0304t0:672_4: sabbaññutāya māyaṃ aññe ca ñeyye sabbaso jānāti.
tika-s0304t0:672_7: Māyañca pajānāmīti na kevalamahaṃ māyaṃ eva jānāmi,
tika-s0304t0:673_2: Ekekasseva āgantukassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā.
tika-s0304t0:673_13: Tattha patiṭṭhitassa upari kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “dhammasamādhismiṃ ṭhito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:673_14: Ayaṃ paṭipadāti tassa kammaphalavādino satthu vacanaṃ sabbesañca ayaṃ mayhaṃ sīlasaṃvarabrahmavihārabhāvanāsaṅkhātāpaṭipadā
tika-s0304t0:673_16: Jayaggāhoti ubhayathāpi mayhaṃ kāci jāni natthi.
tika-s0304t0:674_2: Tatiyavikappe sīlādivisuddhiyā saddhiṃ brahmavihārā yathāvuttatividhadhammāvahattā eva dhammasamādhi nāma.
tika-s0304t0:674_5: tassa paṭipakkhaṃ vikkhambhantī samucchindantī ca hutvā pavattā yathāvuttasamādhi eva visesena cittasamādhi nāma.
tika-s0304t0:679_1: Vipattikāle pana ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0304t0:683_1: Tattha ca natthi ettha taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ nataṃ,
tika-s0304t0:683_2: natthi etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalabhāvoti anataṃ.
tika-s0304t0:684_0: Etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa maraṇaṃ natthīti vā amataṃ.
tika-s0304t0:685_1: Kutoci paccayato anibbattameva hutvā bhūtaṃ vijjamānaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:685_13: Patiṭṭhaṭṭhenāti patiṭṭhābhāvena vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmānaṃ dīpasadisaṃ oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyattā.
tika-s0304t0:689_1: Aṅgulimuddāya gaṇanāya kusaloti aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalo seyyathāpi pādasikā.
tika-s0304t0:689_4: tathāgataṃ sandhāya pucchatīti khīṇāsavoti cassa arahattaphalavasibhāvitakhandhe upādāya ayaṃ paññatti hoti.
tika-s0304t0:689_5: Tesu khandhesu sati khīṇāsavā sattasaṅkhātā hontīti vohārena paññapetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
tika-s0304t0:689_7: tasmā paraṃ maraṇāti vuttattā tesaṃ abhāvā “abyākatameta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:689_8: Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvato “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti puṭṭhāya “āmā”ti paṭijānitabbā siyā,
tika-s0304t0:689_9: taṃ pana sattasaṅkhātassa pucchitattā na paṭiññātanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:689_10: Yena rūpenāti sattatathāgate vuttarūpaṃ sabbaññutathāgate paṭikkhipituṃ “taṃ rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:690_0: Khemāya theriyā vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ suttaṃ bhagavato seṭṭhatthadīpanato aggapadāvacaraṃva hotīti vuttaṃ “aggapadasmi”nti.
tika-s0304t0:695_4: Yo bāhiraparikappito idha tathāgatoti vuccamāno attā.
tika-s0304t0:698_1: Nānāvidhanti taṃtaṃdiṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ aññampi vā nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ.
tika-s0304t0:698_3: Yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchatīti agginā kappavuṭṭhānakāle gacchati,
tika-s0304t0:698_7: Cuticittassa hi oraṃ sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ cuticittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati,
tika-s0304t0:698_14: Yasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe satto aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma,
tika-s0304t0:701_1: Tesaṃ laddhiyāti tesaṃ sassatavādānaṃ laddhiyā saddhiṃ etaṃ “atthattā”ti vacanaṃ ekaṃ abhavissa.
tika-s0304t0:701_2: Tato eva anulomaṃ taṃ nābhavissa ñāṇassāti asāraṃ etanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t0:701_3: Api nu metassāti me etassa anattāti vipassanāñāṇassa anulomaṃ api nu abhavissa,
tika-s0304t0:704_5: asati na hotī”ti ettakaṃ byākaraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0304t0:704_7: ko pana vādo atikkante! Ito atikkante dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva vattabbameva natthīti therassa pañhabyākaraṇaṃ
